00026 #ifndef __GLGpuProgramManager_H__
00027 #define __GLGpuProgramManager_H__
00028 
00029 #include "OgreGpuProgramManager.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00033 class GLGpuProgramManager : public GpuProgramManager
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     typedef GpuProgram* (*CreateGpuProgramCallback)(ResourceManager* creator, 
00037         const String& name, ResourceHandle handle, 
00038         const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader,
00039         GpuProgramType gptype, const String& syntaxCode);
00040 
00041 private:
00042     typedef std::map<String, CreateGpuProgramCallback> ProgramMap;
00043     ProgramMap mProgramMap;
00044 
00045 protected:
00047     Resource* createImpl(const String& name, ResourceHandle handle, 
00048         const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader,
00049         const NameValuePairList* params);
00051     Resource* createImpl(const String& name, ResourceHandle handle, 
00052         const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader,
00053         GpuProgramType gptype, const String& syntaxCode);
00054 
00055 public:
00056     GLGpuProgramManager();
00057     ~GLGpuProgramManager();
00058     GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr createParameters(void);
00059     bool registerProgramFactory(const String& syntaxCode, CreateGpuProgramCallback createFn);
00060     bool unregisterProgramFactory(const String& syntaxCode);
00061 };
00062 
00063 }; //namespace Ogre
00064
